ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet
ygData.msgSnippet: Create a Dark Elf and find the where the rod is located and learn the path to it.  It is in the water, so once you get past a certain point, you jump in the
ygData.messageBody:
Create a Dark Elf and find the where the rod is located and learn the path to
it. It is in the water, so once you get past a certain point, you jump in the
water and swim to the rod. I have never seen any guards in the water around the
rod. Once you have the rod, gate out. Hope to god that invis stays long enough
to get to the water. I actually had it wear off in the middle of the city, but
was lucky enough to find an 'out of the way place' to recast it.

Hope this helps!

Canax Wolfguard
36 level Wizard on Cazic-Thule
Officer of Knights of the Night





"Gregory Egan" <gemd@...> on 02/08/2000 12:53:18 PM

To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: Jim Reigle/OH/US/KMC)

Subject: [eq_wizards] Ice Comet




From: "Gregory Egan" <gemd@...>

Hi all,

To anyone who has completed the Ice Comet quest, was wondering how the rod that
is located in Neriak can be obtained if you are not a Dark Elf or evil race.
Thanks for any hints.

Kronan, Level 47 wiz on Innoruuk
